Articles.Content:
I'm looking for a mod that uses Telemachus to display an orbital map like this on the web browser

Something very similar to the orbital display you get with Raster Prop Monitor, but with the ability of displaying it on another device via web browser.

I know that Primary Flight Display has an orbital map of sorts, but it's pretty small and on the corner. And KeRD's orbial map just plain doesn't work for me at all.

Edited January 10, 2016 by Enma.Darei

These are pretty much the only ones I can think of right now off the top of my head:

Nausicaa

 

GAWD How I hate this stoopid forum software....
Nausicaä seems to be the only one that actually is what I'm looking for, but I'm assuming it is only for Apple devices. This is a problem.

"Go At Throttle Up" mod has an orbital map that shows as a webpage, a small client runs in the background of the PC you're playing KSP on. Plus it adds external cameras and Telemetry as well. May not be quite what you're looking for, but the immersion level is great.

Unknown if it works on 1.0.5 yet, I'm still on 1.0.4 and it works fine.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/72048-0235-go-at-throttle-up-may-11-2014/&page=1

<NOTE, this isn't my image, but you get the idea>

Edited January 10, 2016 by Xorth Tanovar
